attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dear  Sir, I  am Edward Fernandez  an Indian national residing in  Bahrain. I  have paid  all the charges  as requested by the First National bank in London.After paying now  they need  some other charges.Please look  in  this matter awaiting for your urgent action please.The details already forwarded to cabinet office.The director First National Bank LondonDr.Phillip Themba. Tel : + 44 703 191 5897 / + 44  703  191  6049

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
